content.text:
# Dewar (caste)

The Dewar (Dhibara) are a scheduled caste from the Indian states of Chhattisgarh, Odisha and Madhya Pradesh. They are fishing communities.
Subgroups
They are said to be the following:
*Keuta (Kaibartha)
*Nialis
*Rarhis
*Machhua
*Siuli
*Kedar
*Gunduri
*Girigiria
*Malha
*Nauri
References
